name: Cancelled Bills Reinstatement Report
query:
SELECT 
vbc.customer AS Customer,
vbc.customer_group AS `Customer Group`,
vbc.status AS Status,
vbc.custom_mrn AS MRN,
vbc.custom_bill_no  AS `Bill Number`,
vbc.posting_date AS `Bill Date`,
vbc.region AS region ,
vbc.branch AS Branch,
vbc.branch_type AS `Branch Type`,
vbc.entity AS Entity,
vbc.custom_patient_name AS `Patient Name`,
vbc.custom_claim_id AS `Claim Id`,
vbc.total AS `Claim Amount`,
tpe.paid_amount AS `Settled Amount`,
tpe.custom_tds_amount AS TDS,
tpe.custom_disallowed_amount  AS `Disallowed Amount`,
tpe.reference_no AS UTR
FROM viewcancelled_bills AS vbc
LEFT JOIN `tabPayment Entry` tpe ON tpe.custom_sales_invoice = vbc.name 
ORDER BY vbc.custom_mrn , status;
